form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Sanders introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs
Reported by Mr. Sanders, without amendment

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend to all veterans with a serious service-connected injury eligibility to participate in the family caregiver services program.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Caregivers Expansion and Improvement Act of 2013
.

section.header: Extension to all veterans with a serious service-connected disability of eligibility for participation in family caregiver program
section.text: Section 1720G(a)(2)(B) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking on or after September 11, 2001.
